hp.special: 10 + five times your druid level (the companion has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your druid level)

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +2 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d8} plus PB bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice).

reaction.name: Intercept Attack
entries: When a creature the companion can see hits a target with an attack, and the target is within 5 feet of the companion, the target instead takes half the damage. The companion takes the remainder of the damage.
